name: Cuuusigh- Pre Alpha Demo
description:
Take on the role of an ordinary man who finds himself catapulted into a nightmare.

Locked in a cell for drunkenness when you wake up you will have to be able to get out of this prison overrun by monsters. What happened? What awaits you?

Find weapons, acquire powers and defeat hordes of monsters in this 2d shooter.

Command list:

Moves: wasd 

Fire: left click

Power: right click

Version Pre Alpha Demo 0.1.0

All donations will be used to buy coffee and alcohol (the order of purchases may be reversed)
